title: The Crew Returns For Doki Doki Literature Club Part 2 (Content Warning)
description:
Hey Everyone! Before you start this video please keep in mind the content warning tag and the conversation held at the start and end of the video. If any of the moments shown during this stream upset you, trigger your emotions, or have you react in any way that is negative please stop the video and take some time. If you need help reach out to your loved ones, friends, and family or seek help from a trained professional. We have provided information on Mental Health organizations that are here to help you or anyone around you. Please keep this in mind as you enter this video as part two of Doki Doki takes a BIG turn that myself and Nick weren't expecting and need you to be aware of emotions, thoughts, and issues that could arise within you from seeing this imagery. 

Seek Professional Help:
National Suicide Prevention Hotline https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/ 1800-273-8255
OR
TakeThis.org https://www.takethis.org/mental-health-resources/
